delete.title: Delete Strategy
delete.subtitle: Are you sure you would like to delete your strategy?
delete.content: All data on the strategy will be deleted. It will be impossible to restore them.
delete.additionalContent: All funds will be withdrawn to your wallet

pause.title: Pause Strategy
pause.subtitle: Are you sure you would like to pause your strategy?
pause.content: This will prevent your strategy from being traded against, however you will retain access to any associated funds.
